projects.title: Urban Growth Analysis Platform
projects.description: A cloud-based platform for analyzing urban expansion patterns using satellite imagery and machine learning.
projects.details: Built with Google Earth Engine for processing, PostgreSQL/PostGIS for spatial data storage, and a React frontend for visualization. Processes terabytes of Landsat and Sentinel imagery to detect urban changes over time.

projects.title: Geospatial ETL Pipeline Framework
projects.description: A modular framework for building scalable spatial data pipelines with automatic quality assurance.
projects.details: Designed to handle diverse geospatial data formats (Shapefiles, GeoJSON, GeoTIFF) with automated schema detection, transformation, and validation. Includes monitoring dashboard and error handling.

projects.title: Agricultural Monitoring System
projects.description: Real-time crop health monitoring using satellite data and custom vegetation indices.
projects.details: Integrates Sentinel-2 imagery with ground sensor data to provide farmers with actionable insights on crop health, irrigation needs, and yield predictions.

projects.title: QGIS Automation Toolkit
projects.description: A collection of Python scripts and plugins for automating repetitive QGIS workflows.
projects.details: Includes tools for batch processing, data validation, report generation, and integration with external APIs. Reduces manual processing time by 80% for common GIS tasks.

projects.title: Disaster Response Mapping System
projects.description: Real-time mapping platform for emergency response teams during natural disasters.
projects.details: Integrates live sensor data, drone imagery, and crowd-sourced reports to create dynamic situation maps for first responders. Features offline capability and low-bandwidth optimization.

projects.title: Spatial Data Quality Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for monitoring and improving spatial data quality across an organization.
projects.details: Tracks data completeness, positional accuracy, attribute validity, and temporal relevance. Provides automated alerts and recommendations for data improvement.
